message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is worth at least $800000 to me. I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to you. I'm confident you'll see the value in it.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a significant discount from its true worth.  Let me know if you're interested. I'm eager to discuss the details with you.
